privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.intro: We value your privacy and explain our practices here.
privacy.dataCollection: We collect minimal data necessary for operation.
privacy.cookies: Cookies may be used to improve user experience.
privacy.thirdParty: We do not share your data with third parties.

terms.title: Terms & Conditions
terms.intro: By using this site, you agree to the following terms.
terms.acceptance: You must agree to all terms to use this site.
terms.usage: Use this website responsibly and legally.
terms.changes: Terms may change, and continued use is acceptance.
